alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 25 at 3:00AM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Duck River Above Milltown affecting Marshall County. For the Duck River...including Milltown...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Duck River Above Milltown. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 33.6 feet and falling. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CST.
